version_description:
・iOS 7 Support has been added
・The amount of Continues have been increased

・iOS 7 Support has been added
・The amount of Continues have been increased

Several bugs have been fixed.
----------------------------------------------
*[Important] Warning regarding iOS 8 ~ 11
This app may not run correctly under iOS 8 ~ 11.
We apologize for the inconvenience that this may cause, and thank you for your kind understanding.

Several bugs have been fixed.
----------------------------------------------
*[Important] Warning regarding iOS 8 ~ 11
This app may not run correctly under iOS 8 ~ 11.
We apologize for the inconvenience that this may cause, and thank you for your kind understanding.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

・Update to iOS11.
・Correction of a few minor issues.

Important:
Following the update to iOS8,「MULTIPLAYER　MODE」 requires now a Wi-Fi connection instead of a Bluetooth connection.
Furthermore, please make sure to be first logged in to "Game Center" before starting a multiplayer session.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.
